page.title: 12CHURCH ATTENDANCE
page.content: There are 6 churches in Eyemouth, the Parish Church,St Andrews Catholic Church,Methodist Church, E.U. Church, Episcopal Church and Baptist Church. The Parish Church, with about 500 members,has the largest congregation over 50% of whom attend regularly.The Episcopal Church,with 30 members is the smallest but has,along with the Baptist Church,the highest percentage of regular attenders.All churches have a Sunday School but although these are fairly well attended by members,in fact,only about 10% of local children attend Sunday School,and 70% of children are only in church during school services at Christmas and Easter.Apart from weekly collections,money is raised by holding sales of work,afternoon teas,coffee mornings and Gift Day collections.
